publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-231 Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to West Lothian Councilâ€”That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on becoming the first council in Scotland and the only unitary authority in the United Kingdom to be awarded a corporate Charter Mark, awarded as the highest recognition for excellence in public services, and also congratulates the staff of West Lothian Council for their outstanding achievement secured through many years of hard work and developing best practice.
S3M-231 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 22 June 2007) Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Claire Baker*, Andy Kerr*

S3M-231 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 22 June 2007) Robin Harper*, Ken Macintosh*, Des McNulty*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Angela Constance*, George Foulkes*, Helen Eadie*, Marlyn Glen*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-231 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 22 June 2007) Patricia Ferguson*, Trish Godman*
S3M-231 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 22 June 2007) Sarah Boyack*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-231 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 22 June 2007) Cathy Peattie*
